@title Remittance
  Funds can be securely moved from person to person including a trustless third party (exchange shop)

documentation.text:
@dev Reclaim remittance after deadline expired (only by origin)
 @param hashedPassword Hashed password created by createHashedPassword()
@dev Withdraw collected fees from deposits

@dev Ownership can only be renounced (by owner).
      It is required that contract fees were withdrawn and contractFeePercentage was set to 0

changeContractFeePercentage(uint256).details: Change the contract fee percentage that takes a share of the deposits for this contact

params.newContractFeePercentage: The new fee percentage of this contract is given in '%',          therefore between 0 (lower bound) and 50 (upper bound)

changeMaxDurationBlocks(uint256).details: Change the maximum allowed duration until the remittance funds can be reclaimed by sender

params.newMaxDurationBlocks: New maximum duration in blocks for new remittances

params._contractFeePercentage: Sets the initial fees for depositing funds in this contract
params._maxDurationBlocks: Sets the initial upper duration limit in blocks until remittances can be claimed
params.initialState: The state the contract is in after deployment (paused or running)

createHashedPassword(address,bytes32).details: Support function: Create a unique hashed password off-chain to be used for depositFunds() and reclaimFunds()

depositFunds(bytes32,uint256).details: Create a new remittance that can be only withdrawn by the receiver specified in createHashedPassword()

params.durationBlocks: Duration in blocks until sender can reclaim unwithdrawn funds

reclaimFunds(bytes32).details: Reclaim remittance after deadline expired (only by origin)

renounceOwnership().details: Ownership can only be renounced (by owner).      It is required that contract fees were withdrawn and contractFeePercentage was set to 0

withdrawFunds(bytes32).details: Retrieve remittance with the correct password (only by receiver specified in createHashedPassword())

params.clearPassword: Clear password that was kept secret

devdoc.title: Remittance  Funds can be securely moved from person to person including a trustless third party (exchange shop)
